name: Just Another Unfinished Game
description:
Just Another Unfinished Game

This game is made for the Wowie Game Jam 2.0

The topic for the Jam is "Intentional Bugs". So basically this game has bugs in it that you can exploit. The game is randomly generated and the chance of spawning the "Missing code" is very low. You need this if you want to see the end of this game. If there are small bugs in your level there is a huge chance that the "Missing code" has spawned to your game. 

Controls:

WASD for movement

Mouse for rotation

E to Interact

Space Bar to dash

Thank you and if you reached the end please share your screenshot.
